title: Game Scoop Episode 522
description: Google's Stadia game streaming service, The Division 2, StarTropics, and more. The song at the end of this week's episode is called "Holodeck Happy Hour" off Daemon's album, Beyond the Darkness.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
content:encoded: Google's Stadia game streaming service, The Division 2, StarTropics, and more. The song at the end of this week's episode is called "Holodeck Happy Hour" off Daemon's album, Beyond the Darkness.
